entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
